amendatorysection.catchline: License granted under reciprocal agreement; when.
amendatorysection.para: The Board of Barber Examiners shall, upon presentation of a certification of licensure to practice barbering as a registered barber or instructor by the duly constituted authority of another state or country, with which this state has established reciprocal relations as authorized by section 71-239, and subject to the rules of the board, license such applicant to practice in this state unless an examination is required under section 71-242.
